00040 /**
00041  * @file
00042  *
00043  * Functions for SGMII initialization, configuration,
00044  * and monitoring.
00045  *
00046  * <hr>$Revision: 107037 $<hr>
00047  */
00048 #ifndef __CVMX_HELPER_SGMII_H__
00049 #define __CVMX_HELPER_SGMII_H__
00050 
00051 /**
00052  * @INTERNAL
00053  * Probe a SGMII interface and determine the number of ports
00054  * connected to it. The SGMII interface should still be down after
00055  * this call.
00056  *
00057  * @param xiface Interface to probe
00058  *
00059  * @return Number of ports on the interface. Zero to disable.
00060  */
00061 extern int __cvmx_helper_sgmii_probe(int xiface);
00062 extern int __cvmx_helper_sgmii_enumerate(int xiface);
00063 
00064 /**
00065  * @INTERNAL
00066  * Bringup and enable a SGMII interface. After this call packet
00067  * I/O should be fully functional. This is called with IPD
00068  * enabled but PKO disabled.
00069  *
00070  * @param xiface Interface to bring up
00071  *
00072  * @return Zero on success, negative on failure
00073  */
00074 extern int __cvmx_helper_sgmii_enable(int xiface);
00075 
00076 /**
00077  * @INTERNAL
00078  * Return the link state of an IPD/PKO port as returned by
00079  * auto negotiation. The result of this function may not match
00080  * Octeon's link config if auto negotiation has changed since
00081  * the last call to cvmx_helper_link_set().
00082  *
00083  * @param ipd_port IPD/PKO port to query
00084  *
00085  * @return Link state
00086  */
00087 extern cvmx_helper_link_info_t __cvmx_helper_sgmii_link_get(int ipd_port);
00088 
00089 /**
00090  * @INTERNAL
00091  * Configure an IPD/PKO port for the specified link state. This
00092  * function does not influence auto negotiation at the PHY level.
00093  * The passed link state must always match the link state returned
00094  * by cvmx_helper_link_get(). It is normally best to use
00095  * cvmx_helper_link_autoconf() instead.
00096  *
00097  * @param ipd_port  IPD/PKO port to configure
00098  * @param link_info The new link state
00099  *
00100  * @return Zero on success, negative on failure
00101  */
00102 extern int __cvmx_helper_sgmii_link_set(int ipd_port, cvmx_helper_link_info_t link_info);
00103 
00104 /**
00105  * @INTERNAL
00106  * Configure a port for internal and/or external loopback. Internal loopback
00107  * causes packets sent by the port to be received by Octeon. External loopback
00108  * causes packets received from the wire to sent out again.
00109  *
00110  * @param ipd_port IPD/PKO port to loopback.
00111  * @param enable_internal
00112  *                 Non zero if you want internal loopback
00113  * @param enable_external
00114  *                 Non zero if you want external loopback
00115  *
00116  * @return Zero on success, negative on failure.
00117  */
00118 extern int __cvmx_helper_sgmii_configure_loopback(int ipd_port, int enable_internal, int enable_external);
00119 
00120 #endif
